lead_paragraph: Is treatment for gambling addiction different than for other addictions? What's the best way to get the compulsive gambler to stop? What can family members do to encourage treatment, and to protect themselves? These are among the questions recently posed by readers of the Consults blog.
snippet: Dr. Timothy Fong responds to reader questions about the best treatments for gambling addiction and how family members can help compulsive gamblers, and themselves.
